Address.value: 300 GRANITE STREET SUITE 201, BRAINTREE, Massachusetts, 2184, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Altra Industrial Motion Corp is a United States-based company that designs, manufactures, and sells a wide range of mechanical power transmission and motion control products. The company operates through two business segments based on product types and end markets served: the power transmission technologies segment and the automation and specialty segment. The company's product portfolio consists of products such as clutches, brakes, gears, and motion controllers and braking systems, which are used in heavy industrial applications, energy markets, medical, packaging, automation, robotic, and other industries. The company earns most of its revenue in North America ( primarily the United States).
